headline: LESCO THREE STATION ROTATING UV CURING SYSTEM
description: Three Station Rotating UV Curing System     Lesco 3SR-6 Lesco acquired by American Ultraviolet
categories.lvl2: Optical / Photonic Equipment  >  Lamps > Curing Lamps
specstable:
Manufacturer Lesco
Model 3SR-6
Description Three Station Rotating UV Curing System
Lamp Type & Power Electrodeless bulb/1800W
Other Information Controls: Power On/Off, E.P.O., Load Warning Light
Exhaust requirements: 600 cfm @ 1.00 inches H2O, blower built in
Physical size of cured part maximum: 5" diameter x 10" tall
Curing time interval: Adjustable, 1 to 60 seconds standard
Rotational speed of target: Selectable, 8 to 60 RPM
UV light source: FUSION F300
Power Requirements 120 V 10.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 20.000 in (50.8 cm)
Depth 36.000 in (91.4 cm)
Height 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Weight 277 lb (126 kg)
